attributes.action: Ease the lockdown for eid day in may 2021.
attributes.additional_details: As we have missed last 2 eids, and celebrated without families and friends, can we celebrate this eid in may with families like we did christmas day.
attributes.background: Let families get together for eid day, as we did on christmas day.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ease gathering restrictions on religious festivals and holy days
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576482
